movies.name: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
movies.description: Earth's heroes face a new threat as the remnants of the Red Ribbon Army unleash powerful androids, pushing Piccolo and Gohan to their limits in an epic battle for justice!

movies.name: A Haunted House 2
movies.description: In their dream home, Malcolm faces paranormal chaos again. Can he and his new family overcome the bizarre hauntings that threaten their fresh start?

movies.name: How The Grinch Stole Christmas
movies.description: The Grinch, a grouchy green creature, plots to ruin Christmas for the joyful Whoville, but his heart might just change in the process!

movies.name: Terrifier 3
movies.description: The chilling saga of Art the Clown continues as he returns to wreak havoc on unsuspecting victims in this terrifying horror sequel.

movies.name: Hocus Pocus
movies.description: Three resurrected witches run amok in modern-day Salem, and it is up to a group of kids to stop their wicked plans before Halloween night ends!

movies.name: Beetlejuice
movies.description: When a recently deceased couple haunts their former home, they enlist the help of the mischievous ghost Beetlejuice to scare away the new living inhabitants.

movies.name: War for the Planet of the Apes
movies.description: Caesar leads his ape tribe in a fierce battle against humans, exploring themes of loyalty, sacrifice, and the struggle for freedom in this gripping sci-fi epic.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces off against the Joker, a chaotic mastermind bent on plunging Gotham City into anarchy, testing the hero's moral limits like never before.
